summary: Defines a staged pass manager configured for level‑2 optimization in the Qiskit transpiler, applying noise‑adaptive qubit mapping and commutativity‑based gate cancellation to achieve medium‑strength circuit reductions.
business_intent: Offers a ready‑to‑use optimization pipeline that balances performance gains and compilation cost, helping users run quantum circuits with lower depth and error rates on noisy hardware without the overhead of the highest optimization level.
